summary.span: 表示控制台应用程序的标准输入流、输出流和错误流。

span.span: Represents the standard input, output, and error streams for console applications.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台是一个操作系统窗口，用户可在其中通过计算机键盘输入文本输入并读取计算机终端的文本输出，与操作系统或基于文本的控制台应用程序交互。The console is an operating system window where users interact with the operating system or with a text-based console application by entering text input through the computer keyboard, and by reading text output from the computer terminal. 例如，在 Windows 操作系统中，控制台称为 "命令提示符" 窗口并接受 MS-DOS 命令。For example, in the Windows operating system, the console is called the Command Prompt window and accepts MS-DOS commands. 类为从控制台读取字符和向其写入字符的应用程序提供基本支持。The class provides basic support for applications that read characters from, and write characters to, the console. 有关利用 类进行开发的信息，请参阅以下部分：For information about developing with the class, see the following sections: - [控制台 i/o 流Console I/O Streams](#Streams) - [屏幕缓冲区和控制台窗口Screen Buffer and Console Window](#Buffer) - [对控制台的 Unicode 支持Unicode Support for the Console](#Unicode) - [常见操作Common Operations](#Operations) - [.NET Core 说明.NET Core Notes](#Core) ## 控制台 i/o 流Console I/O Streams 当控制台应用程序启动时，操作系统会自动将三个 i/o 流与控制台关联：标准输入流、标准输出流和标准错误输出流。When a console application starts, the operating system automatically associates three I/O streams with the console: standard input stream, standard output stream, and standard error output stream. 您的应用程序可以从标准输入流中读取用户输入;将普通数据写入标准输出流;并将错误数据写入标准错误输出流。Your application can read user input from the standard input stream; write normal data to the standard output stream; and write error data to the standard error output stream. 这些流作为 、和 属性的值呈现给你的应用程序。These streams are presented to your application as the values of the , , and properties. 默认情况下， 属性的值是表示键盘的 对象， 和 属性的值是表示控制台窗口的 对象。By default, the value of the property is a object that represents the keyboard, and the values of the and properties are objects that represent a console window. 但是，可以将这些属性设置为不表示控制台窗口或键盘的流;例如，可以将这些属性设置为表示文件的流。However, you can set these properties to streams that do not represent the console window or keyboard; for example, you can set these properties to streams that represent files. 若要重定向标准输入、标准输出或标准错误流，请分别调用 、或 方法。To redirect the standard input, standard output, or standard error stream, call the , , or method, respectively. 使用这些流的 i/o 操作将同步，这意味着多个线程可以读取或写入流。I/O operations that use these streams are synchronized, which means that multiple threads can read from, or write to, the streams. 这意味着，如果对象表示控制台流，通常是异步的异步方法（如 ）会同步执行。This means that methods that are ordinarily asynchronous, such as , execute synchronously if the object represents a console stream. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用 类在无人参与的应用程序中显示输出，如服务器应用程序。Do not use the class to display output in unattended applications, such as server applications. 对 和 等方法的调用在 GUI 应用程序中不起作用。Calls to methods such as and have no effect in GUI applications. 当基础流被定向到控制台时， 正常工作的类成员可能会引发异常（例如，在将流重定向到文件时）。 class members that work normally when the underlying stream is directed to a console might throw an exception if the stream is redirected, for example, to a file. 如果重定向标准流，请对应用程序进行编程以捕获 异常。Program your application to catch exceptions if you redirect a standard stream. 你还可以使用 、和 属性来确定在执行引发 异常的操作之前是否重定向了标准流。You can also use the , , and properties to determine whether a standard stream is redirected before performing an operation that throws an exception. 有时，显式调用由 、和 属性表示的流对象的成员很有用。It is sometimes useful to explicitly call the members of the stream objects represented by the , , and properties. 例如，默认情况下， 方法从标准输入流读取输入。For example, by default, the method reads input from the standard input stream. 同样， 方法将数据写入标准输出流，数据后跟默认的行终止字符串，这是一个回车符和换行（"\r\n"）。Similarly, the method writes data to the standard output stream, and the data is followed by the default line termination string, which is a carriage return and line feed ("\r\n"). 但是， 类不提供将数据写入标准错误输出流的相应方法，也不提供更改写入到流的数据的行终止字符串的属性。However, the class does not provide a corresponding method to write data to the standard error output stream, or a property to change the line termination string for data written to that stream. 若要解决此问题，可以将 或 属性的 属性设置为另一行终止字符串。You can solve this problem by setting the property of the or property to another line termination string. 例如，下面C#的语句将标准错误输出流的行终止字符串设置为两个回车符和换行符序列：For example, the following C# statement sets the line termination string for the standard error output stream to two carriage return and line feed sequences: `Console.Error.NewLine = "\r\n\r\n";` 然后，你可以显式调用错误输出流对象的 方法，如以下C#语句所示：You can then explicitly call the method of the error output stream object, as in the following C# statement: `Console.Error.WriteLine();` ## 屏幕缓冲区和控制台窗口Screen Buffer and Console Window 控制台中两个密切相关的功能是屏幕缓冲区和控制台窗口。Two closely related features of the console are the screen buffer and the console window. 文本实际上是从控制台所拥有的流中读取或写入的，而是从被称为屏幕缓冲区的控制台所拥有的区域读取或写入。Text is actually read from or written to streams owned by the console, but appear to be read from or written to an area owned by the console called the screen buffer. 屏幕缓冲区是控制台的一个属性，它被组织为行和列的矩形网格，其中每个网格交集或字符单元格都可以包含一个字符。The screen buffer is an attribute of the console, and is organized as a rectangular grid of rows and columns where each grid intersection, or character cell, can contain a character. 每个字符都具有自己的前景色，每个字符单元格都有其自己的背景色。Each character has its own foreground color, and each character cell has its own background color. 屏幕缓冲区通过称为控制台窗口的矩形区域进行查看。The screen buffer is viewed through a rectangular region called the console window. 控制台窗口是控制台的另一个属性;它不是控制台本身，这是一个操作系统窗口。The console window is another attribute of the console; it is not the console itself, which is an operating system window. 控制台窗口按行和列排列，小于或等于屏幕缓冲区的大小，并且可以移动以查看基础屏幕缓冲区的不同区域。The console window is arranged in rows and columns, is less than or equal to the size of the screen buffer, and can be moved to view different areas of the underlying screen buffer. 如果屏幕缓冲区大于控制台窗口，控制台将自动显示滚动条，以便可以将控制台窗口重定位到屏幕缓冲区区域。If the screen buffer is larger than the console window, the console automatically displays scroll bars so the console window can be repositioned over the screen buffer area. 光标指示当前读取或写入文本的屏幕缓冲区位置。A cursor indicates the screen buffer position where text is currently read or written. 可以隐藏或使光标可见，并且可以更改其高度。The cursor can be hidden or made visible, and its height can be changed. 如果光标可见，控制台窗口位置会自动移动，因此光标始终处于视图中。If the cursor is visible, the console window position is moved automatically so the cursor is always in view. 屏幕缓冲区中字符单元坐标的原点是左上角，光标和控制台窗口的位置相对于该原点进行度量。The origin for character cell coordinates in the screen buffer is the upper left corner, and the positions of the cursor and the console window are measured relative to that origin. 使用从零开始的索引来指定位置;也就是说，将最顶部的行指定为行0，将最左侧的列指定为列0。Use zero-based indexes to specify positions; that is, specify the topmost row as row 0, and the leftmost column as column 0. 的行索引和列索引的最大值。The maximum value for the row and column indexes is . ## 对控制台的 Unicode 支持Unicode Support for the Console 通常，控制台使用当前控制台代码页读取输入并写入输出，默认情况下，系统区域设置会定义此页。In general, the console reads input and writes output by using the current console code page, which the system locale defines by default. 代码页只能处理可用 Unicode 字符的一个子集，因此，如果您尝试显示不是由特定代码页映射的字符，则控制台将无法显示所有字符或准确表示它们。A code page can handle only a subset of available Unicode characters, so if you try to display characters that are not mapped by a particular code page, the console won't be able to display all characters or represent them accurately. 以下示例阐释了此问题。The following example illustrates this problem. 它尝试将西里尔字母的字符从 U + 0410 到 U + 044F 显示到控制台。It tries to display the characters of the Cyrillic alphabet from U+0410 to U+044F to the console. 如果在使用控制台代码页437的系统上运行该示例，则每个字符都将替换为问号（？），因为西里尔字符不会映射到代码页437中的字符。If you run the example on a system that uses console code page 437, each character is replaced by a question mark (?), because Cyrillic characters do not map to the characters in code page 437. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/unicode1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/unicode1.vb#1)] [!code-fsharp[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/fs/unicode1.fs#1)] 除了支持代码页以外， 类还支持 类的 UTF-8 编码。In addition to supporting code pages, the class supports UTF-8 encoding with the class. 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始， 类还支持带有 类的 UTF-16 编码。Beginning with the .NET Framework 4.5, the class also supports UTF-16 encoding with the class. 向控制台显示 Unicode 字符。To display Unicode characters to the console. 将 属性设置为 或 。you set the property to either or . 对 Unicode 字符的支持要求编码器识别特定的 Unicode 字符，还需要具有呈现该字符所需标志符号的字体。Support for Unicode characters requires the encoder to recognize a particular Unicode character, and also requires a font that has the glyphs needed to render that character. 若要成功向控制台显示 Unicode 字符，控制台字体必须设置为非光栅或 TrueType 字体，如 Consolas 或宋体。To successfully display Unicode characters to the console, the console font must be set to a non-raster or TrueType font such as Consolas or Lucida Console. 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将字体从光栅字体更改为宋体。The following example shows how you can programmatically change the font from a raster font to Lucida Console. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/cs/setfont1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/vb/setfont1.vb#3)] [!code-fsharp[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/fs/setfont1.fs#3)] 但是，TrueType 字体只能显示部分字形。However, TrueType fonts can display only a subset of glyphs. 例如，$ 黑体控制台字体643只显示从 U + 0021 到 U + FB02 的大约64000个可用字符。For example, the Lucida Console font displays only 643 of the approximately 64,000 available characters from U+0021 to U+FB02. 若要查看特定字体支持哪些字符，请在 "控制面板" 中打开 "**字体**" 小程序，选择 "**查找字符**" 选项，然后在 "**字符映射表**" 窗口的 "**字体**" 列表中选择要检查其字符集的字体。To see which characters a particular font supports, open the **Fonts** applet in Control Panel, choose the **Find a character** option, and choose the font whose character set you'd like to examine in the **Font** list of the **Character Map** window. Windows 使用字体链接来显示在特定字体中无法使用的标志符号。Windows uses font linking to display glyphs that are not available in a particular font. 有关字体链接以显示其他字符集的信息，请参阅[全球化分步：字体](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111)。For information about font linking to display additional character sets, see [Globalization Step-by-Step: Fonts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111). 链接字体在注册表的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE \SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink 子项中定义。Linked fonts are defined in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink subkey of the registry. 与此子项关联的每个条目都对应于基本字体的名称，其值是一个字符串数组，用于定义字体文件和链接到基准字体的字体。Each entry associated with this subkey corresponds to the name of a base font, and its value is a string array that defines the font files and the fonts that are linked to the base font. 数组的每个成员都定义了一个链接字体，并采用*字体*文件名、*字体名称*格式。Each member of the array defines a linked font and takes the form *font-file-name*,*font-name*. 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式定义一个名为 SimSun 的链接字体，该字体文件中找到一个显示简体中文字符的 SimSun. ttc。The following example illustrates how you can programmatically define a linked font named SimSun found in a font file named simsun.ttc that displays Simplified Han characters. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/fontlink1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/fontlink1.vb#2)] [!code-fsharp[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/fs/fontlink1.fs#2)] 为控制台提供以下限制：Unicode support for the console has the following limitations: - 不支持 UTF-32 编码。UTF-32 encoding is not supported. 唯一受支持的 Unicode 编码为 UTF-8 和 UTF-16，分别由 和 类表示。The only supported Unicode encodings are UTF-8 and UTF-16, which are represented by the and classes, respectively. - 不支持双向输出。Bidirectional output is not supported. - 不支持在基本多语言平面（即代理项对）外部显示字符，即使它们是在链接字体文件中定义的。Display of characters outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (that is, of surrogate pairs) is not supported, even if they are defined in a linked font file. - 不支持显示复杂脚本中的字符。Display of characters in complex scripts is not supported. - 组合字符序列（即，由基字符和一个或多个组合字符构成的字符）将显示为单独的字符。Combining character sequences (that is, characters that consist of a base character and one or more combining characters) are displayed as separate characters. 若要解决此限制，可以在将输出发送到控制台之前，先调用 方法，以规范化要显示的字符串。To work around this limitation, you can normalize the string to be displayed by calling the method before sending output to the console. 在下面的示例中，包含组合字符序列 U + 0061 U + 0308 的字符串在输出字符串被规范化之前以两个字符的形式显示在控制台上，并作为在调用 方法之后的单个字符。In the following example, a string that contains the combining character sequence U+0061 U+0308 is displayed to the console as two characters before the output string is normalized, and as a single character after the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/normalize1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/normalize1.vb#5)] [!code-fsharp[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/fs/normalize1.fs#5)] 请注意，仅当字符的 Unicode 标准包含对应于特定组合字符序列的预先组合形式时，规范化才可行。Note that normalization is a viable solution only if the Unicode standard for the character includes a pre-composed form that corresponds to a particular combining character sequence. - 如果字体为私有使用区域中的码位提供了标志符号，则将显示该标志符号。If a font provides a glyph for a code point in the private use area, that glyph will be displayed. 但是，由于专用区域中的字符是特定于应用程序的，因此这可能不是预期的标志符号。However, because characters in the private use area are application-specific, this may not be the expected glyph. 下面的示例向控制台显示一系列 Unicode 字符。The following example displays a range of Unicode characters to the console. 该示例接受三个命令行参数：要显示的范围的开始、要显示的范围的结尾，以及是使用当前控制台编码（`false`）还是 UTF-16 编码（`true`）。The example accepts three command-line parameters: the start of the range to display, the end of the range to display, and whether to use the current console encoding (`false`) or UTF-16 encoding (`true`). 它假定控制台使用 TrueType 字体。It assumes that the console is using a TrueType font. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/example3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/example3.vb#4)] [!code-fsharp[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/fs/example3.fs#4)] ## 常见操作Common Operations 类包含以下用于读取控制台输入和写入控制台输出的方法：The class contains the following methods for reading console input and writing console output: - 方法的重载读取单个字符。The overloads of the method read an individual character. - 方法读取整行输入。The method reads an entire line of input. - 方法重载将值类型的实例、字符数组或一组对象转换为格式化或未格式化的字符串，然后将该字符串写入控制台。The method overloads convert an instance of a value type, an array of characters, or a set of objects to a formatted or unformatted string, and then write that string to the console. - 并行 方法重载与 重载输出相同的字符串，但同时也添加了行终止字符串。A parallel set of method overloads output the same string as the overloads but also add a line termination string. 类还包含用于执行以下操作的方法和属性：The class also contains methods and properties to perform the following operations: - 获取或设置屏幕缓冲区的大小。Get or set the size of the screen buffer. 使用 和 属性可以分别获取或设置缓冲区的高度和宽度， 方法可让你在单个方法调用中设置缓冲区大小。The and properties let you get or set the buffer height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the buffer size in a single method call. - 获取或设置控制台窗口的大小。Get or set the size of the console window. 使用 "" 和 "" 属性，您可以分别获取或设置窗口的高度和宽度，使用 方法可在单个方法调用中设置窗口大小。The and properties let you get or set the window height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the window size in a single method call. - 获取或设置光标的大小。Get or set the size of the cursor. 属性指定光标在字符单元格中的高度。The property specifies the height of the cursor in a character cell. - 获取或设置控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。Get or set the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer. 使用 "" 和 "" 属性可获取或设置显示在控制台窗口中的屏幕缓冲区的最上面一行和最左侧的列， 方法可让你在单个方法调用中设置这些值。The and properties let you get or set the top row and leftmost column of the screen buffer that appears in the console window, and the method lets you set these values in a single method call. - 通过获取或设置 和 属性获取或设置光标的位置，或通过调用 方法设置光标的位置。Get or set the position of the cursor by getting or setting the and properties, or set the position of the cursor by calling the method. - 通过调用 或 方法在屏幕缓冲区中移动或清除数据。Move or clear data in the screen buffer by calling the or method. - 使用 "" 和 "" 属性获取或设置前景色和背景色，或通过调用 方法将背景和前景重置为其默认颜色。Get or set the foreground and background colors by using the and properties, or reset the background and foreground to their default colors by calling the method. - 通过调用 方法，通过控制台扬声器播放提示音。Play the sound of a beep through the console speaker by calling the method. ## [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] 说明Notes 在桌面上的 .NET Framework， 类使用 `GetConsoleCP` 和 `GetConsoleOutputCP`返回的编码，这通常是一种代码页编码。In the .NET Framework on the desktop, the class uses the encoding returned by `GetConsoleCP` and `GetConsoleOutputCP`, which typically is a code page encoding. 例如，在区域性为英语（美国）的系统上，代码页437是默认情况下使用的编码。For example code, on systems whose culture is English (United States), code page 437 is the encoding that is used by default. 但 [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] 只能提供这些编码的有限子集。However, [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] may make only a limited subset of these encodings available. 在这种情况下， 用作控制台的默认编码。Where this is the case, is used as the default encoding for the console. 如果你的应用程序依赖于特定的代码页编码，你仍可以在调用任何 方法*之前*执行以下操作，使其可用：If your app depends on specific code page encodings, you can still make them available by doing the following *before* you call any methods: 1. 将对代码页程序集的引用添加到你的项目。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. 2. 检索 属性中的 对象。Retrieve the object from the property. 3. 将 对象传递到 方法，以使编码提供程序支持的其他编码可用。Pass the object to the method to make the additional encodings supported by the encoding provider available. 如果在调用任何 输出方法之前已注册了编码提供程序，则 类将自动使用默认系统编码，而不是 UTF8。The class will then automatically use the default system encoding rather than UTF8, provided that you have registered the encoding provider before calling any output methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从标准输入和输出流中读取数据以及向其中写入数据。The following example demonstrates how to read data from, and write data to, the standard input and output streams. 请注意，这些流可以使用 和 方法进行重定向。Note that these streams can be redirected by using the and methods. Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. span.span: Plays the sound of a beep through the console speaker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，提示音的频率为800赫兹，持续时间为200毫秒。By default, the beep plays at a frequency of 800 hertz for a duration of 200 milliseconds. > [!NOTE] > Windows Vista 和 Windows XP 的64位版本不支持 方法。The method is not supported on the 64-bit editions of Windows Vista and Windows XP. 包装对 Windows[嘟嘟声功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx)的调用。 wraps a call to the Windows [Beep function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx). 在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本上是否生成声音取决于是否存在8254可编程间隔计时器芯片。Whether produces a sound on versions of Windows before Windows 7 depends on the presence of a 8254 programmable interval timer chip. 从 Windows 7 开始，它取决于默认的声音设备。Starting with Windows 7, it depends on the default sound device. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 此示例接受一个从1到9的数字作为命令行参数，并在出现提示时播放提示音。The example accepts a number from 1 through 9 as a command line argument, and plays the beep that number of times. summary.span: 获取或设置缓冲区的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the buffer area.

value.span: 缓冲区的当前高度，以行为单位。

span.span: The current height, in rows, of the buffer area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义由控制台模式窗口访问的缓冲区中存储的行数（或行数）。This property defines the number of rows (or lines) stored in the buffer that is accessed by a console mode window. 与此相反， 属性定义在任何特定时间实际显示在控制台窗口中的行数。In contrast, the property defines the number of rows that are actually displayed in the console window at any particular time. 如果实际上写入缓冲区的行数超过了 属性定义的行数，则窗口可以垂直滚动，以便显示与 属性相同的行数，并将其放到缓冲区中的任意位置。If the number of rows actually written to the buffer exceeds the number of rows defined by the property, the window can be scrolled vertically so that it displays a contiguous number of rows that are equal to the property and are located anywhere in the buffer. 如果 set 操作减小 属性的值，则会删除最上方的行。If a set operation decreases the value of the property, the uppermost lines are removed. 例如，如果行数从300减少到250，则将删除第0行到第49行，现有行50到299将变为第0到249行。For example, if the number of lines is reduced from 300 to 250, lines 0 through 49 are removed, and the existing lines 50 through 299 become lines 0 through 249. ## Examples 此示例演示 和 属性。This example demonstrates the and properties. 该示例将报告操作系统窗口的尺寸，其缓冲区大小为300行，85列。The example reports the dimensions of an operating system window set to a buffer size of 300 rows and 85 columns. summary.span: 当 修改键 (Ctrl) 和 console 键 (C) 或 Break 键同时按住（Ctrl+C 或 Ctrl+Break）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the modifier key (Ctrl) and either the console key (C) or the Break key are pressed simultaneously (Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件与 和 结合使用。This event is used in conjunction with and . 使用 事件，控制台应用程序可以截获 Ctrl + C 信号，以便事件处理程序可以决定是继续执行还是终止。The event enables a console application to intercept the Ctrl+C signal so the event handler can decide whether to continue executing or terminate. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 用户按下 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break 时，将激发 事件，并执行应用程序的 事件处理程序。When the user presses either Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break, the event is fired and the application's event handler is executed. 向事件处理程序传递一个具有两个有用属性的 对象：The event handler is passed a object that has two useful properties: - ，这允许你确定处理程序是否是由于用户按下 Ctrl + C （属性值为 ）或 Ctrl + Break （属性值 ）而调用的。, which allows you to determine whether the handler was invoked as a result of the user pressing Ctrl+C (the property value is ) or Ctrl+Break (the property value is ). - ，这允许你确定应用程序应如何响应用户按 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break。, which allows you to determine how your application should respond to the user pressing Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break. 默认情况下， 属性是 `false`的，这会导致在事件处理程序退出时程序执行终止。By default, the property is `false`, which causes program execution to terminate when the event handler exits. 将其属性更改为 `true` 指定应用程序应继续执行。Changing its property to `true` specifies that the application should continue to execute. > [!TIP] > 如果你的应用程序具有简单的要求，则可以使用 属性，而不是此事件。If your application has simple requirements, you can use the property instead of this event. 通过将此属性设置为 `false`，可以确保用户按下 Ctrl + C 时始终退出应用程序。By setting this property to `false`, you can ensure that your application always exits if the user presses Ctrl+C. 通过将其设置为 `true`，可以确保按 Ctrl + C 不会终止应用程序。By setting it to `true`, you can ensure that pressing Ctrl+C will not terminate the application. 此事件的事件处理程序在线程池线程上执行。The event handler for this event is executed on a thread pool thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件。The following example demonstrates how the event is used. 按 Ctrl + C 时，读取操作将中断，并调用 `myHandler` 事件处理程序。When you press Ctrl+C, the read operation is interrupted and the `myHandler` event handler is invoked. 进入事件处理程序后，将 `false` 属性，这意味着当事件处理程序终止时，当前进程将终止。Upon entry to the event handler, the property is `false`, which means that the current process will terminate when the event handler terminates. 但是，事件处理程序会将 属性设置为 `true`，这意味着进程将不会终止，读取操作将继续。However, the event handler sets the property to `true`, which means that the process will not terminate and the read operation will resume. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 清除控制台缓冲区和相应的控制台窗口的显示信息。

span.span: Clears the console buffer and corresponding console window of display information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法等效于在命令提示符窗口中调用 MS-DOS `cls` 命令。Using the method is equivalent invoking the MS-DOS `cls` command in the command prompt window. 调用 方法时，光标将自动滚动到窗口的左上角，而屏幕缓冲区的内容则使用当前前景背景色设置为空白。When the method is called, the cursor automatically scrolls to the top-left corner of the window and the contents of the screen buffer are set to blanks using the current foreground background colors. > [!NOTE] > 当控制台应用程序的输出重定向到某个文件时，尝试调用 方法将引发 。Attempting to call the method when a console application's output is redirected to a file throws a . 若要防止出现这种情况, 请始终将对方法`try`的调用包装到 ...`catch`To prevent this, always wrap a call to the method in a `try`…`catch` 模块.block. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法在控制台执行循环之前清除控制台，并提示用户选择前景色和背景色以及输入要显示的字符串。The following example uses the method to clear the console before it executes a loop, prompts the user to select a foreground and background color and to enter a string to display. 如果用户选择不退出程序，控制台的原始前景色和背景色将被还原，并再次调用 方法，然后再重新执行循环。If the user chooses not to exit the program, the console's original foreground and background colors are restored and the method is called again before re-executing the loop. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/cs/clear1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/vb/clear1.vb#1)] 该示例依赖于一个 `GetKeyPress` 方法来验证用户选择的前景色和背景色。The example relies on a `GetKeyPress` method to validate the user's selection of a foreground and background color. 此示例演示 和 属性以及 和 方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 该示例定位游标，该游标确定下一次写入的位置，以使用 "+"、"|" 和 "-" 字符串的组合来绘制5个字符，每5个字符矩形。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 请注意，可以使用其他字符串的组合来绘制矩形，并减少步骤。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. [!code-cpp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CPP/lts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CS/lts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/VB/lts.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取标准错误输出流。

span.span: Gets the standard error output stream.

value.span: 表示标准错误输出流的 。

span.span: A that represents the standard error output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此标准错误流设置为控制台。This standard error stream is set to the console by default. 它可以设置为具有 方法的另一个流。It can be set to another stream with the method. 重定向标准错误流后，可以通过调用 方法重新获取。After the standard error stream is redirected, it can be reacquired by calling the method. 在其信息性输出经常重定向到文件的控制台应用程序中，通过 属性提供的标准错误流可用于向控制台显示信息，即使重定向了输出也是如此。In console applications whose informational output is often redirected to a file, the standard error stream available through the property can be used to display information to the console even if output is redirected. 下面的示例从1开始一次显示10个数字的产品表。The following example displays product tables for 10 numbers at a time starting with 1. 每设置10个数字后，将使用 属性来询问用户是否显示下一组。After every set of 10 numbers, the property is used to ask the user whether to display the next set. 如果标准输出重定向到文件，则系统仍会询问用户是否应该生成下一组产品。If the standard output is redirected to a file, the user is still asked whether the routine should generate the next set of products. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/cs/error1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/vb/error1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例是一个名为 ExpandTabs 的命令行实用程序，它在包含四个空格（由 `tabSize` 变量定义的值）的文本文件中替换制表符。The following example is a command line utility named ExpandTabs that replaces tab characters in a text file with four spaces, the value defined by the `tabSize` variable. 它将标准输入流和输出流重定向到文件，但使用 属性将标准错误流写入控制台。It redirects the standard input and output streams to files, but uses the property to write the standard error stream to the console. 可以通过提供包含制表符和输出文件名称的文件的名称，从命令行启动它。It can be launched from the command line by supplying the name of the file that contains tab characters and the name of the output file. [!code-cpp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CPP/expandtabsex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CS/expandtabsex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/VB/expandtabsex.vb#1)] 下面的示例是一个简单的文本文件查看器，可在控制台中显示一个或多个文本文件的内容。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果没有命令行参数，或者作为命令行参数传递的任何文件都不存在，则该示例调用 方法将错误信息重定向到文件，在 reacquiring 标准错误流的过程中调用 方法，并指示错误信息已写入文件。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 请注意，在 reacquiring 错误流之前， 属性设置为 `true`。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 这可确保将输出立即发送到控制台，而不是进行缓冲处理。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于基于 Windows 的应用程序（在该应用程序中不存在控制台）的 get 操作，将返回 。A get operation for a Windows-based application, in which a console does not exist, returns . ## Examples 下面的示例检查控制台的背景色是否为黑色，如果是，则将背景色更改为红色，将前景色更改为黑色。The following example checks whether the console's background color is black and, if it is, it changes the background color to red and the foreground color to black. [!code-csharp[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/cs/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/vb/Example2.vb#2)] 下面的示例将 枚举的值保存到数组，并将 和 属性的当前值存储到变量。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然后，它会将前景色更改为 枚举中的每种颜色（与当前背景匹配的颜色除外），并且它会将背景色更改为 枚举中的每种颜色，与当前前景匹配的颜色除外。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果前景色与背景色相同，则不显示文本。）最后，它调用 方法来还原原来的控制台颜色。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性设置为标准输入流。This property is set to the standard input stream by default. 此属性可设置为具有 方法的另一个流。This property can be set to another stream with the method. 对标准输入流执行的读取操作同步执行。Read operations on the standard input stream execute synchronously. 也就是说，它们将被阻止，直到指定的读取操作完成。That is, they block until the specified read operation has completed. 即使在 属性返回的 对象上调用异步方法（如 ），也是如此。This is true even if an asynchronous method, such as , is called on the object returned by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `In` 属性。The following sample illustrates the use of the `In` property. summary.span: 获取或设置控制台用于读取输入的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to read input.

value.span: 用于读取控制台输入的编码。

span.span: The encoding used to read console input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台使用输入编码将键盘输入转换为相应的字符。The console uses the input encoding to translate keyboard input into a corresponding character. 输入编码包含将256键盘字符代码映射到各个字符的代码页。The input encoding incorporates a code page that maps 256 keyboard character codes to individual characters. 不同的代码页包含不同的特殊字符，通常会对一种语言或一组语言进行自定义。Different code pages include different special characters, typically customized for a language or a group of languages. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，属性获取操作可能返回缓存值，而不是控制台的当前输入编码。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current input encoding. 如果 属性的值由除对 属性的赋值以外的其他方法修改，例如调用 Windows `SetConsoleCP` 函数或使用 PowerShell 脚本中的 `chcp` 命令，则会发生这种情况。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleCP` function or using the `chcp` command from a PowerShell script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 destination 和 source 参数指定的位置位于当前屏幕缓冲区的边界之外，则仅复制目标区域内容纳的源区域部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located outside the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是说，将剪裁源区域以适合当前屏幕缓冲区。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法将源区域复制到目标区域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 如果目标区域与源区域不相交，则使用当前前景色和背景色填充源区域的空白区域。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with blanks using the current foreground and background colors. 否则，不会填充源区域的相交部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled.

summary.span: 将屏幕缓冲区的指定源区域复制到指定的目标区域。

span.span: Copies a specified source area of the screen buffer to a specified destination area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 destination 参数和 source 参数指定的位置超出了当前屏幕缓冲区的边界，则仅复制目标区域内容纳的源区域部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located beyond the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是说，将剪裁源区域以适合当前屏幕缓冲区。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法将源区域复制到目标区域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 如果目标区域与源区域不相交，则使用 `sourceForeColor` 和 `sourceBackColor`指定的颜色，用 `sourceChar`指定的字符填充源区域。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with the character specified by `sourceChar`, using the colors specified by `sourceForeColor` and `sourceBackColor`. 否则，不会填充源区域的相交部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled. 如果 `sourceWidth` 或 `sourceHeight` 为零，则 方法不执行任何操作。The method performs no operation if `sourceWidth` or `sourceHeight` is zero.

summary.span: 获取标准错误流。

span.span: Acquires the standard error stream.
The standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于在 方法更改标准错误流后重新获取该流。This method can be used to reacquire the standard error stream after it has been changed by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个简单的文本文件查看器，可在控制台中显示一个或多个文本文件的内容。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果没有命令行参数，或者作为命令行参数传递的任何文件都不存在，则该示例调用 方法将错误信息重定向到文件，在 reacquiring 标准错误流的过程中调用 方法，并指示错误信息已写入文件。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 请注意，在 reacquiring 错误流之前， 属性设置为 `true`。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 这可确保将输出立即发送到控制台，而不是进行缓冲处理。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性设置为标准输出流。This property is set to the standard output stream by default. 此属性可设置为具有 方法的另一个流。This property can be set to another stream with the method. 请注意，调用 `Console.Out.WriteLine` 方法等效于调用相应的 方法。Note that calls to `Console.Out.WriteLine` methods are equivalent to calls to the corresponding methods. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性显示一个数组，其中包含应用程序的当前目录中的文件的名称到标准输出设备。The following example uses the property to display an array containing the names of files in the application's current directory to the standard output device. 然后，它将标准输出设置为一个名为 test.txt 的文件，并列出该文件的数组元素。It then sets the standard output to a file named Files.txt and lists the array elements to the file. 最后，它将输出设置为标准输出流，并再次将数组元素显示到标准输出设备。Finally, it sets the output to the standard output stream and again displays the array elements to the standard output device. summary.span: 获取或设置控制台用于写入输出的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to write output.

value.span: 用于写入控制台输出的编码。

span.span: The encoding used to write console output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台使用输出编码将应用程序编写的字符转换为相应的控制台显示字符。The console uses the output encoding to translate characters written by an application into corresponding console display characters. 控制台使用的默认代码页由系统区域设置决定。The default code page that the console uses is determined by the system locale. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始，属性获取操作可能返回缓存值，而不是控制台的当前输出编码。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current output encoding. 如果 属性的值由除对 属性的赋值以外的其他方法（如调用 Windows `SetConsoleOutputCP` 函数）修改，则可能会发生这种情况。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleOutputCP` function.

span.span: The property value in a set operation is .
An error occurred during the execution of this operation.

exception.span: 你的应用程序没有执行此操作的权限。

span.span: Your application does not have permission to perform this operation.

para.span: 在 Unicode 编码中， 类支持具有 类的 UTF-8 编码，从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，它支持具有 类的 UTF-16 编码。

span.span: Of the Unicode encodings, the class supports UTF-8 encoding with the class and, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it supports UTF-16 encoding with the class.

para.span: 不支持带有 类的 UTF-32 编码。

span.span: UTF-32 encoding with the class is not supported.

para.span: 尝试将输出编码设置为32将引发 。

span.span: Attempting to set the output encoding to UTF-32 throws an .

para.span: 请注意，将 Unicode 字符成功地显示到控制台需要以下各项：

span.span: Note that successfully displaying Unicode characters to the console requires the following:

para.span: -控制台必须使用 TrueType 字体（如宋体或 Consolas）来显示字符。

span.span: - The console must use a TrueType font, such as Lucida Console or Consolas, to display characters.

para.span: -控制台使用的字体必须定义要显示的特定标志符号或字形。

span.span: - A font used by the console must define the particular glyph or glyphs to be displayed.

para.span: 如果基本字体不包含该标志符号的定义，则控制台可以利用字体链接来显示链接字体中的字形。

span.span: The console can take advantage of font linking to display glyphs from linked fonts if the base font does not contain a definition for that glyph.

para.span: 有关控制台支持 Unicode 编码的详细信息，请参阅 类中的 "控制台的 Unicode 支持" 部分。

span.span: For more information about support for Unicode encoding by the console, see the "Unicode Support for the Console" section in the class.

summary.span: 从标准输入流读取下一个字符。

span.span: Reads the next character from the standard input stream.

returns.span: 输入流中的下一个字符；如果当前没有更多的字符可供读取，则为负一 (-1)。

span.span: The next character from the input stream, or negative one (-1) if there are currently no more characters to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你键入输入字符时， 方法会阻止其返回;当你按 键时，它将终止。The method blocks its return while you type input characters; it terminates when you press the key. 按 Enter 会将平台相关的行终止序列附加到输入（例如，Windows 追加一个回车换行符序列）。Pressing Enter appends a platform-dependent line termination sequence to your input (for example, Windows appends a carriage return-linefeed sequence). 对 方法的后续调用每次检索输入一个字符。Subsequent calls to the method retrieve your input one character at a time. 检索最后一个字符后， 会再次阻止其返回，并重复周期。After the final character is retrieved, blocks its return again and the cycle repeats. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法或 属性和 方法比使用 方法更可取。The method, or the property and method are preferable to using the method. 请注意，除非您执行下列操作之一，否则方法不会返回-1：Note that the method does not return -1 unless you perform one of the following actions: - 同时按 修改键和 控制台键（Ctrl + Z），这将指示文件尾条件。Simultaneously press the modifier key and console key (Ctrl+Z), which signals the end-of-file condition. - 按指示文件尾条件的等效键，例如 Windows 中的 F6 函数键。Press an equivalent key that signals the end-of-file condition, such as the F6 function key in Windows. - 将输入流重定向到具有实际文件尾字符的源（如文本文件）。Redirect the input stream to a source, such as a text file, that has an actual end-of-file character. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[console.read#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.read/CPP/read.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.read#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.read/CS/read.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.read#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.read/VB/read.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将等待发出 方法的线程上的块，直至按下某个字符或功能键。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 可以将一个或多个 Alt、Ctrl 或 Shift 修改键与一个字符或功能键结合使用。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 不过，按修饰符键本身不会导致 方法返回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 根据你的应用程序，你可能希望将 方法与 属性结合使用。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 即使使用 方法将标准输入重定向到文件， 方法也会从键盘读取。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 方法的最常见用途之一是暂停程序执行，直到用户按下某个键，然后应用程序终止或显示其他信息窗口。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下面的示例使用 方法在终止应用程序之前等待用户按 Enter 键。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/cs/ReadKey1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/vb/ReadKey1.vb#1)] 请注意，默认情况下， 方法的重载会回显用户按下到控制台的任何可显示键。Note that this overload of the method by default echoes any displayable keys that the user presses to the console. 若要取消它们，请使用 `true`的 `intercept` 参数调用 方法。To suppress them, call the method with an `intercept` argument of `true`. 下面的示例使用 方法显示有关用户按下的键的信息。The following example uses the method to display information about which key the user pressed. [!code-cpp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CPP/rk.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CS/rk.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/VB/rk.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将等待发出 方法的线程上的块，直至按下某个字符或功能键。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 可以将一个或多个 Alt、Ctrl 或 Shift 修改键与一个字符或功能键结合使用。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 不过，按修饰符键本身不会导致 方法返回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 如果 `intercept` 参数 `true`，则会截获按下的键，而不会在控制台窗口中显示该键;否则，将显示按下的键。If the `intercept` parameter is `true`, the pressed key is intercepted and not displayed in the console window; otherwise, the pressed key is displayed. 根据你的应用程序，你可能希望将 方法与 属性结合使用。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 即使使用 方法将标准输入重定向到文件， 方法也会从键盘读取。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 方法的最常见用途之一是暂停程序执行，直到用户按下某个键，然后应用程序终止或显示其他信息窗口。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下面的示例使用 方法在终止应用程序之前等待用户按 Enter 键。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. 请注意，如果用户按下任何其他键，则不会回显到控制台。Note that, if the user presses any other key, it is not echoed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从标准输入流中读取一行。The method reads a line from the standard input stream. （对于行的定义，请参阅下面列表后面的段落。）这意味着：(For the definition of a line, see the paragraph after the following list.) This means that: - 如果标准输入设备是键盘，则 方法将被阻止，直到用户按下**enter**键。If the standard input device is the keyboard, the method blocks until the user presses the **Enter** key. 方法的最常见用途之一是在清除控制台和向其显示新信息之前暂停程序执行，或者在终止应用程序之前提示用户按 Enter 键。One of the most common uses of the method is to pause program execution before clearing the console and displaying new information to it, or to prompt the user to press the Enter key before terminating the application. 下面的示例对此进行了演示。The following example illustrates this. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/ReadLineSimple.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLineSimple.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLineSimple.vb#6)] - 如果标准输入重定向到文件，则 方法会从文件中读取一行文本。If standard input is redirected to a file, the method reads a line of text from a file. 例如，下面是一个名为 ReadLine1 的文本文件：For example, the following is a text file named ReadLine1.txt: ``` This is the first line. This is the second line. This is the third line. This is the fourth line. ``` 下面的示例使用 方法读取从文件重定向的输入。The following example uses the method to read input that is redirected from a file. 当方法返回 `null`时，读取操作将终止，这表示不保留要读取的行。The read operation terminates when the method returns `null`, which indicates that no lines remain to be read. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine3.vb#3)] 将示例编译到名为 ReadLine1 的可执行文件后，可以从命令行使用语法来运行该示例。After compiling the example to an executable named ReadLine1.exe, you can run it from the command line with the syntax ``` ReadLine1 < ReadLine1.txt ``` 读取文件的内容并将其显示在控制台中。to read the contents of the file and display them to the console. 行定义为字符序列，后跟回车符（十六进制0x000d）、换行符（十六进制0x000a）或 属性的值。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (hexadecimal 0x000d), a line feed (hexadecimal 0x000a), or the value of the property. 返回的字符串不包含终止字符。The returned string does not contain the terminating character(s). 默认情况下，该方法从256字符输入缓冲区读取输入。By default, the method reads input from a 256-character input buffer. 因为这包括 字符，该方法可以读取最多包含254个字符的行。Because this includes the character(s), the method can read lines that contain up to 254 characters. 若要读取更长的行，请调用 方法。To read longer lines, call the method. 方法以同步方式执行。The method executes synchronously. 也就是说，它会一直阻止，直到读取行或按下 Ctrl + Z 键盘组合。That is, it blocks until a line is read or the Ctrl+Z keyboard combination is pressed. 属性返回一个表示标准输入流的 对象，该对象同时具有同步 方法和异步 方法。The property returns a object that represents the standard input stream and that has both a synchronous method and an asynchronous method. 但是，当用作控制台的标准输入流时， 会同步执行，而不是异步执行，只在读取操作完成后返回 `Task`。However, when used as the console's standard input stream, the executes synchronously rather than asynchronously and returns a `Task` only after the read operation has completed. 如果此方法引发 异常，则读取器在基础 对象中的位置将由该方法可以读取的字符数提前，但已读入内部 缓冲区的字符将被丢弃。If this method throws an exception, the reader's position in the underlying object is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 由于读取器在流中的位置不能更改，已读取的字符不可恢复，只能通过重新初始化 来访问。Since the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 如果流中的初始位置未知或流不支持查找，则还需要重新初始化基础 。If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying also needs to be reinitialized. 若要避免这种情况并生成可靠的代码，应使用 属性和 方法，并在预分配的缓冲区中存储读取字符。To avoid such a situation and to produce robust code, you should use the property and method and store the read characters in a pre-allocated buffer. 如果在方法从控制台读取输入时按下 Ctrl + Z 字符，则该方法将返回 `null`。If the Ctrl+Z character is pressed when the method is reading input from the console, the method returns `null`. 这样，当在循环中调用 方法时，用户可以阻止进一步的键盘输入。This enables the user to prevent further keyboard input when the method is called in a loop. 下面的示例演示了这种情况。The following example illustrates this scenario. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/readline2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine2.vb#1)] ## Examples 以下示例需要两个命令行参数：现有文本文件的名称，以及要将输出写入到其中的文件的名称。The following example requires two command line arguments: the name of an existing text file, and the name of a file to write the output to. 它将打开现有的文本文件，并将键盘上的标准输入重定向到该文件。It opens the existing text file and redirects the standard input from the keyboard to that file. 它还将标准输出从控制台重定向到输出文件。It also redirects the standard output from the console to the output file. 然后，它使用 方法读取文件中的每一行，将四个空格的每个序列替换为制表符，并使用 方法将结果写入输出文件。It then uses the method to read each line in the file, replaces every sequence of four spaces with a tab character, and uses the method to write the result to the output file. [!code-cpp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CPP/inserttabs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CS/inserttabs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/VB/inserttabs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前景色和背景色还原为当前进程开始时存在的颜色。The foreground and background colors are restored to the colors that existed when the current process began. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例将 枚举的值保存到数组，并将 和 属性的当前值存储到变量。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然后，它会将前景色更改为 枚举中的每种颜色（与当前背景匹配的颜色除外），并且它会将背景色更改为 枚举中的每种颜色，与当前前景匹配的颜色除外。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果前景色与背景色相同，则不显示文本。）最后，它调用 方法来还原原来的控制台颜色。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法来指定在控制台窗口中的下一次写入操作开始的位置。Use the method to specify where the next write operation in the console window is to begin. 如果指定的光标位置在控制台窗口中当前可见的区域外，则窗口源会自动更改，使游标可见。If the specified cursor position is outside the area that is currently visible in the console window, the window origin changes automatically to make the cursor visible. 每次将字符写入控制台窗口时，光标会自动移动到下一个字符位置。The cursor automatically moves to the next character position each time a character is written to the console window. 如果光标位于控制台窗口的右下角字符位置，则下一次写入操作将导致控制台窗口滚动，使光标保持可见。If the cursor is at the bottom right character position of the console window, the next write operation causes the console window to scroll so the cursor remains visible. 如果要在不导致控制台窗口滚动的情况下向右下字符位置写入字符，请使用 方法将字符移动到该位置。If you want to write a character to the bottom right character position without causing the console window to scroll, use the method to move a character to that position. ## Examples 此示例演示 和 属性以及 和 方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 该示例定位游标，该游标确定下一次写入的位置，以使用 "+"、"|" 和 "-" 字符串的组合来绘制5个字符，每5个字符矩形。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 请注意，可以使用其他字符串的组合来绘制矩形，并减少步骤。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作系统窗口显示控制台窗口，控制台窗口显示屏幕缓冲区的一部分。The operating system window displays the console window, and the console window displays a portion of the screen buffer. 方法会影响控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置，但不会影响操作系统窗口相对于桌面的位置。The method affects the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer, but does not affect the position of the operating system window relative to the desktop. 控制台和操作系统 windows 通常不会相互影响。The console and operating system windows generally do not affect each other. 但是，如果屏幕缓冲区无法在控制台窗口的当前边界内显示，操作系统会自动将滚动条附加到操作系统窗口。However, if the screen buffer cannot be displayed in the current boundaries of the console window, the operating system automatically appends scroll bars to the operating system window. 在这种情况下，移动操作系统窗口滚动条会影响控制台窗口的位置，而将控制台窗口移到 方法会影响操作系统窗口滚动条的位置。In that case, moving the operating system window scroll bars affects the position of the console window, and moving the console window with the method affects the position of the operating system window scroll bars. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 、、、、、和 属性;和 、和 方法。The following example demonstrates the , , , , , , and properties; and the , , and methods. 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区宽度在屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width. 然后，该示例将移动控制台窗口，以响应按下的向上键、向下键、向左键或向右键的控制台键。Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed. 网格模式可帮助您查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是将修改键 和控制台键 的组合 (Ctrl+C) 视为普通输入，还是视为由操作系统处理的中断。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false` 属性的值，并且按下 Ctrl + C，则按下的键不会存储在输入缓冲区中，操作系统会终止当前正在执行的进程。If the value of the property is `false` and Ctrl+C is pressed, the pressed keys are not stored in the input buffer and the operating system terminates the currently executing process. 这是默认值。This is the default value. > [!CAUTION] > 请谨慎使用此属性，因为将其设置为 `true` 会带来巨大影响。Use this property judiciously because setting it to `true` has such a dramatic effect. 大多数用户希望使用 Ctrl + C 终止控制台应用程序。Most users expect Ctrl+C to terminate a console application. 如果禁用 Ctrl + C 的效果，则用户必须记得使用 Ctrl + Break 终止应用程序，这是一个不太熟悉的键组合。If you disable the effect of Ctrl+C, the user must remember to use Ctrl+Break to terminate the application, which is a less familiar key combination. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 的属性。The following example demonstrates the property. value.span: 控制台窗口的最左边的位置，以列为单位。

span.span: The leftmost console window position measured in columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台将一个矩形窗口表示为一个更大的矩形缓冲区区域。The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area. 窗口和缓冲区都按行数垂直度量，并按列数水平测量。Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns. 缓冲区的尺寸由 和 属性定义。The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the and properties. 控制台区域的尺寸由 和 属性定义。The dimensions of the console area are defined by the and properties. 属性确定在控制台窗口的第一列中显示缓冲区区域的哪一列。The property determines which column of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window. 属性的值的范围为0到 - 。The value of the property can range from 0 to - . 尝试将其设置为超出该范围的值将引发 。Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an . 当控制台窗口首次打开时， 属性的默认值为零，指示控制台显示的第一列对应于缓冲区中的第一列（位置为零的列）。When a console window first opens, the default value of the property is zero, which indicates that the first column shown by the console corresponds to the first column (the column at position zero) in the buffer area. 控制台窗口和缓冲区区域的默认宽度均为80列。The default width of both the console window and the buffer area is 80 columns. 这意味着，仅当控制台窗口变窄或缓冲区区域变宽时，才能修改 属性。This means that the property can be modified only if the console window is made narrower or the buffer area is made wider. 请注意，如果缓冲区的宽度超过控制台窗口的宽度，则当用户使用水平滚动条来定义窗口与缓冲区区域的关系时，将自动调整 属性的值。Note that if the width of the buffer area exceeds the width of the console window, the value of the property is automatically adjusted when the user uses the horizontal scroll bar to define the window's relationship to the buffer area. 尝试在输出重定向时设置 属性的值将引发 异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws an exception. 若要防止出现此异常，只能在 属性返回 `false`时设置此属性的值。To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例打开一个80列控制台窗口，并定义一个宽度为120列的缓冲区。The following example opens an 80-column console window and defines a buffer area that is 120 columns wide. 它显示有关窗口和缓冲区大小的信息，然后等待用户按向左键或向右键。It displays information on window and buffer size, and then waits for the user to press either the LEFT ARROW key or the RIGHT ARROW key. 在前一种情况下，如果结果是合法值，则它会将 属性的值减一。In the former case, it decrements the value of the property by one if the result is a legal value. 在后一种情况下，如果结果是合法的，则会将 属性的值增加1。In the latter case, it increases the value of the property by one if the result would be legal. 请注意，该示例不必处理 ，因为它会检查要分配给 属性的值是否不是负数，并且不会导致 和 属性的总和超过 属性值。Note that the example does not have to handle an , because it checks that the value to be assigned to the property is not negative and does not cause the sum of the and properties to exceed the property value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台将一个矩形窗口表示为一个更大的矩形缓冲区区域。The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area. 窗口和缓冲区都按行数垂直度量，并按列数水平测量。Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns. 缓冲区的尺寸由 和 属性定义。The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the and properties. 控制台区域的尺寸由 和 属性定义。The dimensions of the console area are defined by the and properties. 属性确定在控制台窗口的第一列中显示的缓冲区区域的行。The property determines which row of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window. 属性的值的范围为0到 - 。The value of the property can range from 0 to - . 尝试将其设置为超出该范围的值将引发 。Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an . 尝试在输出重定向时设置 属性的值将引发 异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws an exception. 若要防止出现此异常，只能在 属性返回 `false`时设置此属性的值。To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 、、、、、和 属性;和 、和 方法。The following example demonstrates the , , , , , , and properties; and the , , and methods. 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区宽度在屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width. 然后，该示例将移动控制台窗口，以响应按下的向上键、向下键、向左键或向右键的控制台键。Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed. 网格模式可帮助您查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer. [!code-cpp[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/CPP/wlt.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/CS/wlt.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/VB/wlt.vb#1)] [!code-fsharp[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/FS/wlt.fs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试在输出重定向时设置 属性的值将引发 或 异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws either an or an exception. 若要防止出现异常，只能在 属性返回 `false`时设置此属性的值。To prevent an exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 此示例演示 方法以及 和 属性。This example demonstrates the method, and the and properties. 若要查看更改控制台窗口大小的完整效果，必须运行该示例。You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size. 该示例报告将控制台窗口的维度设置为85列和43行，然后等待按键。The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key press. 按任意键时，控制台窗口的维度会减半，并报告新维度，然后该示例将等待另一个按键。When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press. 最后，当按任意键时，控制台窗口将还原为其原始维度，该示例将终止。Finally, when any key is pressed the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates. span.span: An object to write using .

summary.span: 使用指定的格式信息将指定对象的文本表示形式写入标准输出流。

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified object to the standard output stream using the specified format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 .NET Framework 的[复合格式设置功能](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入字符串。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串将写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format` 参数包含与零个或多个索引占位符（称为格式项）混合的零个或多个文本的运行，这些占位符与此方法的参数列表中的对象相对应。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换为相应对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是 `{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*格式*值]`}`，它指定了必需索引、格式化文本的可选长度和对齐方式，以及控制如何设置相应对象的值的格式的可选字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这一支持。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关 、和 的某些重载等方法支持的复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings)和[自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `WriteLine` 方法演示数字、日期和枚举的标准格式说明符。The following example uses the `WriteLine` method to demonstrate the standard formatting specifiers for numbers, dates, and enumerations. [!code-cpp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cpp/wl.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cs/wl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/vb/wl.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example illustrates the use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 .NET Framework 的[复合格式设置功能](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入字符串。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串将写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format` 参数包含与零个或多个索引占位符（称为格式项）混合的零个或多个文本的运行，这些占位符与此方法的参数列表中的对象相对应。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换为相应对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是 `{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*格式*值]`}`，它指定了必需索引、格式化文本的可选长度和对齐方式，以及控制如何设置相应对象的值的格式的可选字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这一支持。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关 、和 的某些重载等方法支持的复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings)和[自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). `arg` 参数是参数数组。The `arg` parameter is a parameter array. 参数可以作为数组或五个或更多项的列表传递给方法。Arguments can be passed to the method either as an array or as list of five or more items. 这些示例演示了两种形式的方法调用。The examples illustrate both forms of method call. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有多个属性的 `Person` 类，这些属性提供有关用户的信息。The following example defines a `Person` class with a number of properties that provide information about a person. 它的 `GetDescription` 方法返回数组，该数组包含除一个属性值之外的所有属性值。Its `GetDescription` method returns an array that contains all of the property values except one. 然后，该示例使用 `GetDescription` 方法返回的数组来显示 Person 对象的值。The example then uses the array returned by the `GetDescription` method to display the values of the Person object. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cs/WriteParams1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/vb/WriteParams1.vb#1)] 请注意，该示例调用 方法，而不是 方法，因为它会尝试在同一行上显示 `Person.Remarks` 属性的值。Note that the example calls the method rather than the method because it attempts to display the value of the `Person.Remarks` property on the same line. 为此，它将检查 的值并 属性，以确定是否有足够的空间来容纳注释。To do this, it examines the value of the and properties to determine whether there is enough space for the remark to fit. 如果存在，则会显示该行。If there is, it displays the line. 如果不是，它将写入一行，缩进三个空格，并显示注释。If not, it writes a line, indents three spaces, and displays the remark. 下面的示例与第一个示例相同，只不过它提供五项列表作为 `arg` 参数，而不是参数数组。The following example is identical to the first, except that it supplies a five-item list as the `arg` argument instead of a parameter array. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Write#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cs/WriteParams2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Write#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/vb/WriteParams2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此 API 不兼容 CLS。This API is not CLS-compliant. 符合 CLS 的替代方法是 。The CLS-compliant alternative is . C#和 Visual Basic 编译器会自动将对此方法的调用解析为对 的调用。The C# and Visual Basic compilers automatically resolve a call to this method as a call to . 此方法使用 .NET Framework 的[复合格式设置功能](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入字符串。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串将写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format` 参数包含与零个或多个索引占位符（称为格式项）混合的零个或多个文本的运行，这些占位符与此方法的参数列表中的对象相对应。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换为相应对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是 `{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*格式*值]`}`，它指定了必需索引、格式化文本的可选长度和对齐方式，以及控制如何设置相应对象的值的格式的可选字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这一支持。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关 、和 的某些重载等方法支持的复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings)和[自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将变量参数与 方法一起使用。The following example illustrates the use of variable parameters with the method. 使用复合格式字符串和五个格式项调用方法。The method is called with a composite format string and five format items. [!code-cpp[System.Console.Write#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cpp/con_write.cpp#3)]

summary.span: 将指定的数据（后跟当前行终止符）写入标准输出流。

span.span: Writes the specified data, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的行终止符是一个字符串，其值为回车符后跟一个换行符（在中C#为 "\r\n"，或者在 Visual Basic 中为 `vbCrLf`）。The default line terminator is a string whose value is a carriage return followed by a line feed ("\r\n" in C#, or `vbCrLf` in Visual Basic). 可以通过将 属性的 属性设置为另一个字符串来更改行终止符。You can change the line terminator by setting the property of the property to another string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的行终止符是一个字符串，其值为回车符后跟一个换行符（在中C#为 "\r\n"，或者在 Visual Basic 中为 `vbCrLf`）。The default line terminator is a string whose value is a carriage return followed by a line feed ("\r\n" in C#, or `vbCrLf` in Visual Basic). 可以通过将 属性的 属性设置为另一个字符串来更改行终止符。You can change the line terminator by setting the property of the property to another string. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 该示例将行终止符从其默认值 "\r\n `vbCrLf`" 更改为 "\r\n\r\n" 或 `vbCrLf` + `vbCrLf`。The example changes the line terminator from its default value of "\r\n" or `vbCrLf` to "\r\n\r\n" or `vbCrLf` + `vbCrLf`. 然后，它调用 和 方法以将输出显示到控制台。It then calls the and methods to display output to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 为 `null`，则只写入行终止符。If `value` is `null`, only the line terminator is written. 否则，将调用 `value` 的 `ToString` 方法来生成字符串表示形式，并将生成的字符串写入标准输出流。Otherwise, the `ToString` method of `value` is called to produce its string representation, and the resulting string is written to the standard output stream. 有关行终止符的详细信息，请参阅不带参数的 方法的 "备注" 部分。For more information about the line terminator, see the Remarks section of the method that takes no parameters. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将对象数组中的每个值显示到控制台。The following example uses the method to display each value in an object array to the console.
